LanguageData.Mashed_Bloodmoon_TransformHuman_Desc: End {0_label}'s transformation, reverting them back to their human form. All lycanthrope stress will be converted into lycanthrope fatigue, preventing them from transforming again until they have recovered.\n\nCurrent exhuastion duration: {1}
LanguageData.Mashed_Bloodmoon_TransformLycanthrope_De: Transform {0_label} into their lycanthrope form. Lycanthrope stress will accumulate during this transformation, which will be converted into lycanthrope fatigue once the transformation ends. If lycanthrope stress reaches 100%, {0_label} will enter a rage state.\n\nMaximum transformation duration: {1}
LanguageData.Mashed_Bloodmoon_LycanthropeStressGizmo_: The current level of lycanthrope stress {0_label} is experiencing. Lycanthrope stress gradually builds up during a transformation. If it reaches 100%, the lycanthrope will enter a rage state, putting anyone nearby in danger.\n\nStress gain rate: 10 per hour
